info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 28 at 11:48PM PDT until July 29 at 1:30AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by previously excessive rainfall is ongoing across the Las Vegas Valley. * WHERE...Clark County, Nevada including the Las Vegas Valley. * WHEN...Until 245 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1144 PM PDT, The public and local law enforcement reported ongoing flooding in the advisory area due to earlier heavy rain. Flood waters are receding, but numerous roadways continue to experience flowing water over them. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, Boulder City, Green Valley, Paradise, Sam Boyd Stadium, Anthem, The Strip, East Las Vegas, Southern Highlands, Enterprise, Downtown Las Vegas, Lake Las Vegas, Spring Valley, Mountains Edge, Nellis AFB, Las Vegas Bay, The Motor Speedway and Aliante. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
